message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. It's a great value considering its worth to you is $100.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to get a better deal.  How about $85?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I am unable to lower the price below $90. This is the best offer I can make.
Alice,  I understand you're trying to get the best price, but $90 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $88.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Bob, I understand your position and I'm willing to negotiate further. Considering the value of the product to you, I can offer it at $89. Let me know if this works for you.
